name: Laser Penguin
description:
To protect its friends and family, a brave penguin undergoes a biomechanical enhancement surgery to become the... LASER PENGUIN

Arrow keys to control movement

Spacebar to shoot laser

External Assets Used:

Sound Effects

'laser1' by dklon

'Sci-Fi Weapon Reloading' by 18hiltc https://freesound.org/people/18hiltc/

'Chewing Sound' by FesliyanStudios

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

Music 

'Cyber Noir' and 'Rapid' by PeriTune

'Modern Chillout' by penguinmusic
